IE, i have a portal in falador. i want to make it so if i click use portal, i teleport to admin zone, and get a genie lamp ( mine works :D)
any1 know what to do? i kno its something to do with cases…
portal = 2469
this is what i want it to have:

case = blah blah if(teleblock == 0){ teleportToX = 2539; teleportToY = 4712; addItem(995, 25); sendMessage("You recive a Genie lamp .You also teleport to the admin zone."); sendMessage("If you are a non-Staff player, you will be killed and you will loose your genie lamp."); } else if(teleblock >= 1){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else if(tbed == 1) { sendMessage("You have been permanently teleblocked."); } }
